document_data.name: Dragonfire
document_data.mainbody: '''Dragonfire''' was an expensive [[sherry]] exported from the city of [[Zazesspur]] in [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Description: The alcoholic beverage had a distinctly deep amber color.
document_data.History: As of the late 14{{th}}, Dragonfire sherry could be found in Zazesspur as well as in [[Morgan's Inn]] â€“ a large tavern and inn located in the city of [[Velen]]. The drink was sold for four [[silver piece]]s per bottle. [[Volothamp Geddarm]] mentioned the libation in his guide to the [[Lands of Intrigue]] as "being worth every coin."
